title: Special 8 Ball
summary: Get answers to life questions from your wrist
description: Ever had a question but not sure of the answer? Needed advice but no one to get it from? Or just needed reassurance about that brand new car you just bought? Then use the Special 8 Ball!Designed specifically for Android Wear, Special 8 Ball will answer your questions to the best of its ability...if it wants to. Just download the app and it'll automatically be installed onto your Android Wear device. Note: you must have an Android Wear device.  There is no phone companion app. There is only the wear app and that's it, although the app can still be uninstalled from the phone, but why do that?  Compatible with all Android Wear devices and requires no permissions!
descriptionHTML:
Ever had a question but not sure of the answer? Needed advice but no one to get it from? Or just needed reassurance about that brand new car you just bought? Then use the Special 8 Ball!

Designed specifically for Android Wear, Special 8 Ball will answer your questions to the best of its ability...if it wants to. Just download the app and it'll automatically be installed onto your Android Wear device. Note: you must have an Android Wear device.

There is no phone companion app. There is only the wear app and that's it, although the app can still be uninstalled from the phone, but why do that?

Compatible with all Android Wear devices and requires no permissions!
comments: total Hoot. I would suggest that you have a way to "return" to the ask screen, rather than just tap for a new answer.  Still a really funny waste of time. Thanks!
